title: oc6 - files trashbin app - undefined index: etag shown on top of the deleted files list
body:
## expected behavior

no notices etc. should be show when using an owncloud function.

## actual behavior

the following notice message is displayed shortly before the list of deleted files/folders is shown. i realized that this message appeared right after i have deleted a file. as i deleted a second file the message was shown twice.

```
notice: undefined index: etag in /var/www/htdocs/owncloud/apps/files/lib/helper.php on line 43 
```

## steps to reproduce

1. select the files app and delete a file
2. click on the `deleted files`button to show the list of deleted files/folders.

## environment:

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache2 2.4.6
database: mysql 5.1.72
php version: 5.4.21
owncloud version: 6.0


#### client configuration

browser: firefox 26.0
operating system: windows 7
